Controls.Description: All AAD groups must be security enabled (TBD)
Controls.Rationale: TBD. Need to discuss/review this further.

Controls.Description: Group must have at least one non-guest (native) owner
Controls.Rationale: Guest users in a tenant can be transient. Ensuring that at least one FTE owner is accountable for managing a group, approving/reviewing membership, etc. leads to better governance.
